async_info.video_title: Deciding to donate a loved one's organs - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
Next year the law on organ donations in England will change, with donor consent being presumed, unless relatives expressly refuse permission.
This is already the law in Wales. More than 50,000 people today are alive thanks to organ donations, but 400 die every year while waiting for a transplant.
Despite this, 4 in 10 families still refuse to allow a donation.
BBC News spoke to some of the doctors and nurses who help bereaved people reach their decision.
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

Don't be so stuck up and think your so important that you won't let no one touch your DEAD body.

comment_content.original_script:
National Death Service.
Just murdered my ma-in-laws best friend.
She had caught pneumonia via the pneumonia jab and was only talking on the phone from hospital 2 days ago, then her sister was told she was dying.
She and her husband were told to go home and we'll phone you if anything changes.
Within one hour she was dead.
They could and SHOULD have stayed, because that is when they overdose them on morphine to free up the bed ASAP.
The NHS are MURDERERS and the people who work in it should be ashamed to call themselves 'caring'.
I removed my name from the organ transplant list a year ago to make sure this lot never take them.

async_comment.comment_content_initial: National Death Service. Just murdered my ma-in-laws best friend. She had caught pneumonia via the pneumonia jab and was only talking on the phone from hospital 2 days ago, then her sister was told she was dying. She and her husband were told to go home and we'll phone you if anything changes. Within one hour she was dead. They could and *SHOULD* have stayed, because that is when they overdose them on morphine to free up the bed ASAP. The NHS are *MURDERERS* and the people who work in it should be ashamed to call themselves 'caring'. I removed my name from the organ transplant list a year ago to make sure this lot never take them.
